title: Wolf spider
data:

*For a list of all arthropods, see [list of arthropods](/List_of_arthropods "List of arthropods").*

| wolf spider s [![Wolf spider.png](/images/6/6a/Wolf_spider.png)](/File:Wolf_spider.png) |                                                                                     |
| --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [HP](/Hit_points "Hit points")                                                          | 36-74                                                                               |

| [Will](/Willpower "Willpower")                                                          | 20                                                                                  |
| Attack1                                                                                 | 25 ([hit](/Attack_type "Attack type"): [plain](/Attack_flavour "Attack flavour"))   |
| Attack2                                                                                 | 15 ([bite](/Attack_type "Attack type"): [poison](/Attack_flavour "Attack flavour")) |
| [Resistances](/Resistance "Resistance")                                                 | None                                                                                |
| [Vulnerabilities](/Vulnerability "Vulnerability")                                       | [Poison](/Poison "Poison")                                                          |

| [Intelligence](/Monster_intelligence "Monster intelligence")                            | [Animal](/Category:Animal_intelligence "Category:Animal intelligence")              |

|   |                                                                                                                                          |
| - | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | A hairy fast-moving hunting spider with vicious mandibles. It roams the dungeon in search of prey, which it kills with its deadly venom. |

## Useful Info

**Wolf spiders** are one of the simpler arachnids, but also one of the most durable and vicious. They can keep up with hasted players, have far more [HP](/HP "HP") than most spiders, and pack a painful, [poisonous](/Poison "Poison") bite that can tear up a low-on-mana caster quickly. Even worse, while they may be encountered alone, they also appear in large groups with other spider varieties. They can occasionally be found in [the Dungeon](/The_Dungeon "The Dungeon") and [the Vaults](/The_Vaults "The Vaults"), and are very common in the [Spider's Nest](/Spider%27s_Nest "Spider's Nest").

## Tips & Tricks

- Although poison resistance will mostly prevent their bites from poisoning you, they still do heavy damage. Decent [AC](/AC "AC") and [EV](/EV "EV") are strongly recommended.
- Like most bugs, wolf spiders are vulnerable to poison. [Mephitic Clouding](/Mephitic_Cloud "Mephitic Cloud") a crowd of them should create a lot of dead spiders very quickly.
- [Ignite Poison](/Ignite_Poison "Ignite Poison") also works well, especially since you'll probably be fighting a few other kinds of spiders at the same time.
html:
Wolf spider

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.28: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.

For a list of all arthropods, see list of arthropods.

wolf spider s 
HP 36-74
HD 11
XP 567
Speed 15
AC 3
EV 10
Will 20
Attack1 25 (hit: plain)
Attack2 15 (bite: poison)


Resistances None
Vulnerabilities Poison
Habitat Land
Intelligence Animal
Uses Uses nothing
Holiness Natural
Size Medium
Type spider, wolf spider
Flags No skeleton
Web immune
A hairy fast-moving hunting spider with vicious mandibles. It roams the dungeon in search of prey, which it kills with its deadly venom.

Useful Info

Wolf spiders are one of the simpler arachnids, but also one of the most durable and vicious. They can keep up with hasted players, have far more HP than most spiders, and pack a painful, poisonous bite that can tear up a low-on-mana caster quickly. Even worse, while they may be encountered alone, they also appear in large groups with other spider varieties. They can occasionally be found in the Dungeon and the Vaults, and are very common in the Spider's Nest.

Tips & Tricks

  • Although poison resistance will mostly prevent their bites from poisoning you, they still do heavy damage. Decent AC and EV are strongly recommended.
  • Like most bugs, wolf spiders are vulnerable to poison. Mephitic Clouding a crowd of them should create a lot of dead spiders very quickly.
  • Ignite Poison also works well, especially since you'll probably be fighting a few other kinds of spiders at the same time.
